sndlib.core.util
Class MaximumLinkFlow

java.lang.Object
  sndlib.core.util.MaximumLinkFlow

public class MaximumLinkFlow
extends java.lang.Object

This is a simple class containing the maximum flows on a specific link, together with the states in which the flow values are assumed.

Author:
Roman Klaehne
See Also:
SolutionUtils.calculateMaximumLinkFlow(Link, SolvedProblem)

Method Summary
 Link getLink()
          Returns the link on which the flow is routed.
